verses.verse: You are the children<WH1121> of the LORD<WH3068> your God:<WH430> you shall not cut<WH1413> yourselves, nor<WH3808> make<WH7760> any baldness<WH7144> between<WH996> your eyes<WH5869> for the dead.<WH4191>

For you are an holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> to the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and the LORD<WH3068> has chosen<WH977> you to be a peculiar<WH5459> people<WH5971> to himself, above all<WH3605> the nations<WH5971> that are on the earth.<WH127>
You shall not eat<WH398> any<WH3605> abominable<WH8441> thing.
These<WH2063> are the beasts<WH929> which<WH834> you shall eat:<WH398> the ox,<WH7794> the sheep,<WH3775> and the goat,<WH5795>
The hart,<WH354> and the roebuck,<WH6643> and the fallow<WH3180> deer,<WH3180> and the wild<WH689> goat,<WH689> and the pygarg,<WH1788> and the wild<WH8377> ox,<WH8377> and the chamois.<WH2169>

And every<WH3605> beast<WH929> that parts<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> and separates<WH8157> the cleft<WH8156> into two<WH8147> claws,<WH6541> and chews<WH5927> the cud<WH1625> among the beasts,<WH929> that you shall eat.<WH398>

Nevertheless<WH389> these<WH2088> you shall not eat<WH398> of them that chew<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> or of them that divide<WH6536> the cloven<WH8156> hoof;<WH6541> as the camel,<WH1581> and the hare,<WH768> and the coney:<WH8227> for they chew<WH5927> the cud,<WH1625> but divide<WH6536> not the hoof;<WH6541> therefore they are unclean<WH2931> to you.

And the swine,<WH2386> because<WH3588> it divides<WH6536> the hoof,<WH6541> yet chews not the cud,<WH1625> it is unclean<WH2931> to you: you shall not eat<WH398> of their flesh,<WH1320> nor<WH3808> touch<WH5060> their dead<WH5038> carcass.<WH5038>
These<WH2088> you shall eat<WH398> of all<WH3605> that are in the waters:<WH4325> all<WH3605> that have fins<WH5579> and scales<WH7193> shall you eat:<WH398>
And whatever<WH3605> <WH834> has not fins<WH5579> and scales<WH7193> you may not eat;<WH398> it is unclean<WH2931> to you.
Of all<WH3605> clean<WH2889> birds<WH6833> you shall eat.<WH398>
But these<WH2088> are they of which<WH834> you shall not eat:<WH398> the eagle,<WH5404> and the ossifrage,<WH6538> and the ospray,<WH5822>
And the glede,<WH7201> and the kite,<WH344> and the vulture<WH1772> after his kind,<WH4327>
And every<WH3605> raven<WH6158> after his kind,<WH4327>
And the owl,<WH1323> <WH3284> and the night<WH8464> hawk,<WH8464> and the cuckow,<WH7828> and the hawk<WH5322> after his kind,<WH4327>
The little<WH3563> owl,<WH3563> and the great<WH3244> owl,<WH3244> and the swan,<WH8580>
And the pelican,<WH6893> and the gier<WH7360> eagle,<WH7360> and the cormorant,<WH7994>
And the stork,<WH2624> and the heron<WH601> after her kind,<WH4327> and the lapwing,<WH1744> and the bat.<WH5847>
And every<WH3605> creeping<WH8318> thing that flies<WH5775> is unclean<WH2931> to you: they shall not be eaten.<WH398>
But of all<WH3605> clean<WH2889> fowls<WH5775> you may eat.<WH398>

You shall not eat<WH398> of anything<WH3605> that dies<WH5038> of itself: you shall give<WH5414> it to the stranger<WH1616> that is in your gates,<WH8179> that he may eat<WH398> it; or<WH176> you may sell<WH4376> it to an alien:<WH5237> for you are an holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> to the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430> You shall not seethe<WH1310> a kid<WH1423> in his mother's<WH517> milk.<WH2461>
You shall truly tithe<WH6237> all<WH3605> the increase<WH8393> of your seed,<WH2233> that the field<WH7704> brings<WH3318> forth<WH3318> year<WH8141> by year.<WH8141>

And you shall eat<WH398> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> he shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> there,<WH8033> the tithe<WH4643> of your corn,<WH1715> of your wine,<WH8492> and of your oil,<WH3323> and the firstborn<WH1062> of your herds<WH1241> and of your flocks;<WH6629> that you may learn<WH3925> to fear<WH3372> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> always.<WH3605> <WH3117>

And if<WH3588> the way<WH1870> be too long<WH7235> for you, so that you are not able<WH3201> to carry<WH5375> it; or if<WH3588> the place<WH4725> be too far<WH7368> from you, which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to set<WH7760> his name<WH8034> there,<WH8033> when<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has blessed<WH1288> you:

Then shall you turn<WH5414> it into money,<WH3701> and bind<WH6887> up the money<WH3701> in your hand,<WH3027> and shall go<WH1980> to the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose:<WH977>

And you shall bestow<WH5414> that money<WH3701> for whatever<WH3605> <WH834> your soul<WH5315> lusts<WH183> after, for oxen,<WH1241> or for sheep,<WH6629> or for wine,<WH3196> or for strong drink,<WH7941> or for whatever<WH3605> <WH834> your soul<WH5315> desires:<WH7592> and you shall eat<WH398> there<WH8033> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and you shall rejoice,<WH8055> you, and your household,<WH1004>
And the Levite<WH3881> that is within your gates;<WH8179> you shall not forsake<WH5800> him; for he has no<WH369> part<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with you.

At the end<WH7097> of three<WH7969> years<WH8141> you shall bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> all<WH3605> the tithe<WH4643> of your increase<WH8393> the same<WH1931> year,<WH8141> and shall lay<WH3240> it up within your gates:<WH8179>

And the Levite,<WH3881> (because<WH3588> he has no<WH369> part<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with you,) and the stranger,<WH1616> and the fatherless,<WH3490> and the widow,<WH490> which<WH834> are within your gates,<WH8179> shall come,<WH935> and shall eat<WH398> and be satisfied;<WH7646> that the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> may bless<WH1288> you in all<WH3605> the work<WH4639> of your hand<WH3027> which<WH834> you do.<WH6213>
